data.actual_result: It gives warning and adds emoji
data.expected_result: It would not give a warning.
data.short_description: Adding emoji on pinned messages gives you you are rate limited warning but it adds the emoji
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new text channel or have one - Send a message  - Pin it - Go to pinned messages from 3 dots on the right up - Hold the message and select add emoji - Add a emoji and it will give you are being rate limited warning - Go back to the message and you will see that emoji has been added
